title: Greg Miller Loses His Mind - Greg's Childtime Teachings (ALL EPISODES)
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Greg wanted to teach the youth some important lessons, and it's all made possible by your support over on Patreon.com/KindaFunny!
